EVTDESC3315: I wake up screaming in the night. The darkness scares me, and I keep wondering how I will last through this campaign.
EVTOPTB3315: My soldiers will not respect me.
EVTDESC60004: The Great Khagan has sent more warriors to aid our conquest!
EVTOPTA40021: I will grant [From.GetObjectPronoun] a claim on the perpetrator's titles.
SETTLEMENT_AT_LEAST: Holding is at least $AGE$ years old.\n
RELEASE_FROM_PRISON_INTERACTION_1: Your vassals will think you merciful, increasing their opinion of you by §G$VAL$§!.
city_contract_0_desc: The Burghers are expected to provide half their troops for the defense of the realm.
city_contract_1_desc: The Burghers are expected to provide the majority of their troops for the defense of the realm.
city_contract_2_desc: The Burghers are expected to provide almost all their troops for the defense of the realm.
city_contract_3_desc: The Burghers are expected to provide all but a tiny part of their troops for the defense of the realm.
IS_NOT_DE_JURE_LIEGE_OR_ABOVE: Is NOT de jure liege or above
IS_DE_JURE_LIEGE_OR_ABOVE: Is de jure liege or above
MAXIMUM_RAISABLE_LEVY: Levy at disposal due to laws: §Y$VALUE$%§!
LEVY_PERC_DESC: We are allowed to raise the top §Y$PERC$%§W of the levy
RAISABLE_AMOUNT_LEVY: Due to laws(§Y$MAX$%§!) and opinion(§Y$OPINION$%§!), we can raise §Y$PERCENT$%§! of the levy
MINIMUM_RAISABLE_LEVY: However, we are always allowed to raise at least §Y$PERCENT$%§! of the levy
AI_THIS_IS_GOOD_FOR_US: The best I can hope for'
AI_WE_ARE_WINNING_SMALL: Things are certainly going my way'
AI_WE_ARE_WINNING_BIG: I've already won, give up now and I'll spare your life'
AI_WE_ARE_LOSING_BIG: I'm losing, but won't give up yet...'
ENDGAME_TEXT_ENDGAME: The Renaissance sweeps across Europe and the Feudal era draws to a close.
ENDGAME_TEXT_LANDLESS: After playing $NUMCHARS$ characters, you have lost your last County. $ENDCHAR$ disappears into obscurity...
ASSAULT_NOT_LEADING_SIEGE: We cannot order an assault since we are not the leader of the siege
ASSAULT_ENOUGH_DAYS: We can order an assault on the holding, but we might take serious losses if we attempt to do so
ASSAULT_DAYSREQ: Time required before attempting assault: §Y$DAYS$§! day(s)
ASSAULT_FORTLEVEL_DAYS: Base days depending on fort level: §Y$DAYS$§!
ASSAULT_RELATIVE_SIZE: Time reduction based on relative army strength: $PERC$
ASSAULT_NOT_ENOUGH_DAYS: We need another §Y$DAYS_LEFT$§! days(s) to complete the construction of our siege weapons
tut_menu_9_description: This tutorial will introduce you to the most basic parts of what Crusader Kings II is and how you play it.
tut_menu_0_description: Learn about the hierarchy of titles
tut_1b_2: As you can see in the upper right, you have a limit for how many Holdings you can control directly. If you cross this limit, you will get negative effects in the form of tax penalties and your vassals disliking you
tut_1b_3: To prevent this from happening, make sure you keep under your Demesne limit by handing out landed titles to your vassals. Now, click a County.
tut_1b_5: A County can have different types of Holdings. Depending on what you build in the County, you will get different amounts of tax money, and different kinds of troops from it.
CROWN_LAW_DESC: The Crown Laws of the §Y$CROWN_TITLE$§! apply in the §Y$TITLE$§!
HIRE_MERC_DESC: Hire §Y$TITLE$§W for §Y$COST$§W gold. (They will arrive in or nearby §Y$CAPITAL$§W.)
SIEGE_LEAD_BY: If the siege is won, the controller of §Y$SETTLEMENT$§! will be the §Y$TITLE$§!
HINT_SPLASH_MAP: Crusader Kings II takes place on a fully 3D map. You can zoom in and out using your mouse scroll wheel. Holding down the scroll wheel and moving the mouse lets you pan. You can always reset the map by pressing Backspace.
INTERACTION_REQUIRES_CHILD_OF_EDU_AGE: §Y$CHILD$§! needs to be at least §Y$AGE$§! years old
CONFIRM_DISBAND_DESC6: Only $NUM$ of $TOTAL$ troops will be able to return home.
CONFIRM_DISBAND_DESC7: Only $NUM$ of $TOTAL$ ships will be able to return home.
CONFIRM_DISBAND_TITLE_ALL: Do you wish to dismiss these units?
CONFIRM_DISBAND_DESC8: $NUM$ units will stand down and return home.
TERRAIN_BONUS: If a combat takes place here, the defender will get a defensive bonus
twin_desc: This character had the fortune of being born with a twin. Twins like each other better.
EVTDESC38054: To [Root.GetTitledFirstName] from [From.GetTitledFirstName]. Due to your crimes against the True Faith, we can no longer serve you. You should repent and seek guidance from [From.Religion.GetRandomGodName].
LOADING_TIP_31: Under Gavelkind Succession Law, you suffer no Prestige penalty for having unlanded sons.
LOADING_TIP_32: Gavelkind Succession Law allows you to have a larger demesne.
LOADING_TIP_33: Employed Holy Orders cost no maintenance when you are defending against heretics or infidels.
cattle_gateshell: Sacrificed Cattle to Close Gates of Hell
stones_gateshell: Filled Gates of Hell with Stones
sacrifice_gateshell: Human Sacrifice Closed Gates of Hell
TITLE_HISTORY_DESC: Show the Holder History for this Title
INTERACTION_REQUIRES_NOT_AT_WAR_OR_VASSA: Cannot grant titles to non-vassals when at war
UNIT_UNLOAD_DESC: Click to select troops onboard ships
EVTDESC10100: The earth shook, the people screamed and buildings cracked. A cloud of foul-smelling air swept over the village, making torches and fires burn bright green for several hours. It took a couple of days repairing the cracked buildings and salvaging items from the few older houses that had collapsed, luckily everyone escaped unharmed. I slowly walked through the city, examining the buildings and noting what remained to be repaired when an excited peasant approached me. Without bothering with formalities, he told me about a giant crack in the ground just outside his farm. He wanted me to come and inspect it, and perhaps determine what to do about it.
EVTOPTB10100: Of course! Show the way, peasant!
EVTDESC10101: The foul smell that had swept over the city the day the earth shook slowly crept up on us and I retched involuntarily. The wound that had burst open in the farmer's field spewed fire and brimstones and we stopped, aghast at the sight. The flames and fiery stones threatened the bare ground around the gap, the farmer was lucky his fields lay fallow.
EVTOPTA10101: It's just a hole in the ground
EVTOPTB10101: I must take a closer look at this
EVTTOOLTIP10102: The Gate and its Tortured Souls
EVTDESC10102: Wailings, screams and cries for help seemed to emit from the burning gap. The farmer grew pale and refused to take one step further. I walked as close to the hell hole as I dared and tried to peek down. Apart from the occasional fiery stone and eyebrow-licking flame, I could see nothing. The wailings and screams seemed to increase until it felt as if my head would explode. I stumbled backward, felt the ground shifting beneath my feet and would have fallen into the pit if the farmer hadn't grabbed my arm and pulled me away from it.
EVTOPTB10102: I need this gap closed. Now!
EVTTOOLTIP10103: There is a way to close the Gap, but how?
EVTDESC10103: I gave the wisest men and women of my court three days to come up with a solution on how to close this gap that seemed to open the whole way to hell. Within three days, they all had thought up different solutions to the problem.
EVTTOOLTIP10104: The priest will perform an exorcism
EVTTOOLTIP10105: The demon inhabiting the gap should be satisfied
EVTOPTD10103: Sacrifice the most precious thing in the world
EVTTOOLTIP10107: A sacrifice to close the gap
EVTDESC10104: The priest walked several times around the gap, sprinkling holy water and chanting the words 'Vade retro satana! Vade retro satana!', avoiding the fiery stones and flames spewing from the gap as best he could. At the end of the third turn, he knelt and began praying, the only words to be heard 'Vade retro satana!'...
EVTOPTB10104: This won't work. Try something else
EVTDESC10105: The cows balked in front of the gap and refused to take any step further. They had to be pushed into the gap and their miserable mooing mixed with the wailings of the tortured souls trapped in the pit until they hit the bottom.
EVTOPTB10105: I don't believe in this idea
EVTDESC10106: Cartload after cartload of rocks and gravel were shoveled into the gap while the workers desperately tried to stay clear of the flames and fiery stones that seemed to increase in number. The screams of pain from the bottom of the pit affected the workers and some refused to keep shoveling in the gravel. I had to promise them no one was trapped down there but did not want anyone to descend into whatever madness the pit was.
EVTDESC10107: One of the wise women told me she had a vision during the three days they were supposed to meditate on how to close the gap. She said the peril would be overcome only when I threw into the chasm what I held to be most dear, and I immediately thought of my eldest son. With a heavy heart I agreed to meet the wise woman at the pit together with my oldest son.
EVTOPTA10107: I hope I won't regret this
EVTOPTB10107: There must be some other way!
EVTDESC10108: The gap finally closed! No more fiery stones and flames, no more wailing voices from the underground!
EVTOPTA10108: The priest did a fine job exorcising the Gate back to Hell!
EVTOPTB10108: The Gates of Hell closed after we fed it cattle!
EVTOPTC10108: The Gates of Hell was filled in with stones!
EVTOPTD10108: It took a human sacrifice but now the Gates of Hell is closed!
EVTDESC10109: Despite everything, the gap stubbornly refused to close and spewed even more fiery stones and wailing voices.
EVTOPTA10109: For Heaven's sake... what will I do now?
STAT_INTRIGUE_DESC: Intrigue skill is the primary attribute of the Spymaster. High Intrigue improves the chances of uncovering plots and carrying out skullduggery like assassinations.
STAT_STEWARDSHIP_CHAR_DESC: With a Stewardship skill of §Y$VALUE$§W, §Y[GetTitledFirstName]§W is considered $DESC$ administrator. It also affects the maximum size of your demesne.
HINT_LAW_VIEW_TEXT_3: Kingdoms and Empires have access to a special set of laws called Crown Laws. These affect all de jure vassals, not just those who are de facto part of the realm. However, infidels and heretics outside the de facto realm remain unaffected.
EVTDESC6212: My neighbor has quite probably the finest ass around, but then Jesus whispered to me that this was wrong.
EVTOPTA6212: Jesus is right, this is wrong
EVTDESC6213: For too long I have felt incomplete, that my spirit was somehow lacking. Then the voice reminded me that true fruit of the spirit was kindness.
EVTDESC6214: For too long I have directed my anger towards those who dimply do not deserve it. Jesus whispered to me and reminded me that I should direct it those who had sinned.
EVTOPTA6214: I will be a true soldier of God
EVTDESC6215: I have been so quick to judge, I realize it now. The voice reminds me that I should seek what is good for all.
EVTDESC6216: I am proud and I thought myself noble for I rejected all that was weak and insipid. Then the voice reminded me that I was rejecting God when I worshipped myself thus?
EVTOPTA6216: Then I realized how wrong I was.
EVTDESC6217: For too long I believed that it was the Greeks who would inherit the earth. Then Jesus whispered that is was simply a typo in my Bible and that in reality it was the meek.
EVTOPTA6217: Then I will be more meek
EVTDESC6218: Jesus whispers have become more frantic of late. He is worried that Satan has corrupted his words through his agents at the various ecumenical councils. He has asked me to seek out the good news that Philip brought so that I can understand the true role of Mary.
EVTOPTA6218: I will do as our Lord Commands
EVTDESC6219: For too long I have felt powerless as our enemies advance, but lately Jesus has been promising me victories if only I can get commend.
EVTDESC6220: Lately Jesus has fallen silent over military matters. I feel somehow lessened because without the Lord who am I?
EVTOPTA6220: It must be a punishment for my sins
EVTDESC6221: I felt the holy spirit fill me and just like the Apostles of yore I could speak in the tongues of many peoples, as the holy spirit gave me the power to express myself.
EVTOPTA6221: The only problem is no one else can
EVTDESC6222: The holy spirit left me and I felt lessened. Some cynics commented that I was finally sober, but they did not understand what the true love of the Lord felt like.
LOADING_TIP_34: Your councillors cannot both lead troops and perform missions in counties.
LOADING_TIP_36: If you have no Spymaster, you cannot discover plots.
LOADING_TIP_37: Sometimes the most skilled Councillor is also an enemy. Tread carefully.
LOADING_TIP_38: You'll have better results plotting against your liege if you are the Spymaster.
LOADING_TIP_39: Use your Court Chaplain to convert the religion of counties and vassals.
LOADING_TIP_40: All your children will get claims on your titles.
LOADING_TIP_41: Delegate. A smaller group of direct vassals is easier to control.
LOADING_TIP_42: Allies might refuse to participate in a war against someone they like more than you.
LOADING_TIP_43: You can also build improvements in the Holdings of your direct vassals.
LOADING_TIP_44: Children tend to get the same traits and skills as their assigned guardian.
LOADING_TIP_45: Just as Christians have Crusades, Muslims have Jihad.
LOADING_TIP_46: Nobles care about Prestige. Religious leaders care about Piety. Everyone cares for Gold.
LOADING_TIP_47: If an Antipope dethrones the reigning pope, he becomes the new Pope.
EVTDESC73204: I promised [From.GetBestName] that [From.GetSheHe] had a chance to become Marshal of the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]. Now [From.GetSheHe] is petitioning me again about it.
EVTDESC73214: I promised [From.GetBestName] that [From.GetSheHe] had a chance to become Spymaster of the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]. Now [From.GetSheHe] is petitioning me again about it.
EVTDESC73224: I promised [From.GetBestName] that [From.GetSheHe] had a chance to become Steward of the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]. Now [From.GetSheHe] is petitioning me again about it.
EVTDESC73234: I promised [From.GetBestName] that [From.GetSheHe] had a chance to become [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] of the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]. Now [From.GetSheHe] is petitioning me again about it.
EVTDESC73244: I promised [From.GetBestName] that [From.GetSheHe] had a chance to become [Root.GetChancellorName] of the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]. Now [From.GetSheHe] is petitioning me again about it.
tut_4b_6: Check the tooltips on the opinion number for some of your vassals. The opinions they have of you is based on a number of things, like personal diplomacy, free investiture, autonomy, and some personality traits will go better or worse together. If you are patient and your vassal is wroth, that does not make for a good relationship.
tut_4b_8: The opinion modifiers that are based on character traits are all permanent. Other things can change the opinions between characters affected by trait modifiers, but as long as the trait stays, so does the modifier. Then we have temporary modifiers of course.
tut_4b_12: You do this by sending your chancellor to the province and fabricating a claim there. It will take a while, but you can try it in the basic war tutorial.
tut_4c_5: Below the portrait of your wife are two golden rings on blue background. This is a button that will allow you to arrange a marriage for the current character. Click it to continue.
tut_4c_6: Here you can see a list of unmarried women. Not all are appropriate of course. Some are too young, a real marriage will not start until both of you are over 16. Some are too old, you want them to be able to have your children. Some have nothing to offer you. To help you decide, there are buttons that can sort the list according to your desires. Click next to continue.
tut_4c_12: Here you can see what effects this marriage will have on your prestige. You can also see that she will answer yes to your proposal, so just go ahead and send it.
tut_5a_13: As soon as the second troop arrives (you can hover over the troop to see when in the tooltip), select both of them by clicking on one side and dragging a box around them. You'll first need to close the army details screen to see them both. Now you have a merge button over the info screen for the two armies. Click that to create one bigger army.
tut_5c_7: These troops are free to hire, but they only attack religious enemies, and they only exist around the time of crusades, so they are a bit limited. If you are defending against infidels or heretics, they have no maintenance cost either. Now, raise your personal levy and select it to continue.
EVTDESC38301: My skin is glowing, my hair is always perfect and the opposite sex yearn for me to take notice of them. I have gained the Fair trait.
EVTDESC36052: [From.GetTitledFirstName] is such a humble vassal, giving me the honor of [From.GetHerHis] kill from the hunt. [From.GetSheHeCap] is a benefit to my rule, and [From.GetHerHis] humility is an example to us all.
EVTDESC74035: It was a mistake inviting The Jumping Jews of Jerusalem to the Summer Fair. They are jumping at different rhythms despite the rhythmic twang of a harp. They tirelessly keep jumping, jumping, jumping... until one of them loses his balance and falls towards his brothers, causing all of them to fall to the floor.
EVTDESC65060: I haven't grown as much as the other children and people tell me I'm a 'dwarf'. The other children found out and are mocking me, calling me goblin and pretend to be afraid when I come near them...
EVTOPTA65060: I will give them something to be afraid of!
EVTOPTB65060: I won't give them the pleasure of seeing me cry...
EVTDESC65061: Despite my small stature, I have gained the respect of my court. Until a Dwarf Troupe appeared at the castle gates and none of them were taller than me...
EVTOPTA65061: I pity them, and refuse to have them perform
EVTOPTC65061: I let them perform, what harm can it do?
EVTDESC65065: There's a dwarf at the court and, being the giant of a [Root.GetManWoman] that I am, people has been pestering me to test my strength by tossing the dwarf as far as I can.
EVTDESC65066: Before I knew it, [From.GetTitledFirstName] picked me up and tossed me away! Luckily for me, I landed in a haystack head-first and was not hurt badly although my temper took a bad turn for the worse...
EVTOPTA65066: Are you insane or just an idiot?!
EVTDESC65070: I am usually so careful climbing down the narrow steps, what with my clubfoot making me clumsy and prone to fall down the stairs. Today, I wasn't as cautious as I should've been...
EVTOPTA65070: I landed at the bottom of the steps, badly hurt...
EVTDESC65071: I cannot run around playing with the other children as much as I like because of my clubfoot, and the other children has started making fun of me. They dart towards me, gives me a small push and then run away giggling and shouting 'Catch me if you can!'...
EVTOPTA65071: Next time, my fist will redecorate their faces!
EVTOPTB65071: I ignore them, hoping they will tire and go away
EVTDESC65072: My clubfoot makes it hard for me to use a regular saddle, I need one with a custom-made stirrup that is big enough. Therefore I was much dismayed when someone had misplaced my special stirrup.
EVTOPTB65072: Try to use a regular one
EVTDESC65073: The new stirrup seemed to work fine, until my usually steady horse tried to throw me off by bucking and rearing. Finally it succeded, but because of the narrow stirrup my clubfoot got stuck and so I was dragged after the horse several yards before someone grabbed its reins and made it stop.
EVTDESC65074: I fear my clubfoot hinders me from getting married! As I am not as graceful as the other women at court, I'd rather not dance or do anything too exhausting that will cost me my balance and make me a laughing stock.
EVTOPTA65074: Despite my clubfoot, I should take any chance to dance!
EVTOPTB65074: I ask my father to look for a suitor!
EVTOPTC65074: I should be content with what I have
EVTDESC65080: I am teased for my harelip, the other children tells me my mother must have looked at a hare's split lip when she was pregnant with me and wished for me to look the same.
EVTOPTB65080: I ignore them, their words hold no truth
EVTDESC65081: I was talking to one of my vassals and was interrupted by a courtier. Trying to be courteous, I presented them to each other, only to mispronounce the vassal's name because of my harelip...
EVTOPTA65081: Shamed, I refuse to acknowledge the mispronunciation
EVTOPTB65081: I ask the vassal to forgive me
EVTDESC65085: I mostly play the monster whenever the other children let me play with them. They say my hunchback makes me the perfect person for the monster part, and even if it hurts when they say that I still get to play with them, and that is usually good enough for me.
EVTOPTA65085: Not today, today I'll show you the real monster!
EVTOPTB65085: I think I must accept my role...
EVTDESC65090: Who can love someone like me? The hunch on my back, my ugly face? I pray to [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] every chance I get to find me someone to love.
EVTOPTC65090: [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] cannot help me, only I can
EVTDESC65091: I walked slowly, no thoughts in my mind when someone ran into me from behind. We fell to the ground together and I grabbed the young woman instinctively, ready to defend myself from her scorn. Instead, she looked pleadingly at me and asked me to help her flee from the guards who had harassed her since she arrived in [Root.Location.GetName].
EVTDESC65092: I managed to save Hope, as the young woman's name was, from the guards and we spent the next few days together. She did not seem to notice my hunchback, only the man I am before it. It startled me when I realized I had begun to love her, my Hope in love...
EVTOPTB65092: But she cannot love someone like me!
EVTDESC65095: People are laughing at me, saying that my hunchback makes me less of a [Root.GetManWoman]!
EVTOPTB65095: They do not know me, so why should I care?
EVTDESC65100: The other children ask me to say words, giggles when I try to pronounce them without lisping but always fails and it makes me feel sick to my stomach. Why are they so mean to me?
EVTOPTB65100: I don't want to play with them anymore
EVTDESC65101: During my conversation with a vassal I tried to lisp as little as possible, but when a courtier came up to us and wanted me to introduce [Root.GetHerHimOpp] to the vassal I could barely make myself understood when I tried to pronounce the vassal's name.
EVTOPTA65101: Lisp? Me? No, you must be wrong!
EVTDESC65102: My lisp sometimes makes it hard for people to understand me, and when I become frustrated the lisp becomes worse, making it even harder to understand me.
EVTOPTA65102: I won't let this control my life!
EVTOPTB65102: I must learn to live with this
EVTOPTC65102: I shall pray and hope my lisp disappear
EVTDESC65105: The more upset I become, the more I stutter and the other children are well aware of this. Their taunting and pestering makes me sad but I cannot tell them that without stuttering which makes them laugh even more.
EVTOPTB65105: I'll hide from them so they will forget about me
EVTDESC65106: I seldom stutter these days, unless I am upset, frustrated or excited. The more I try to force the words to leave my tongue the more I stutter and the more frustrated I get...
EVTOPTC65106: I shall pray and hope my stutter will disappear
EVTDESC65107: I had managed to talk to speak to my vassal for several minutes without stuttering not even once! Then I got stuck on the vassal's name when I was supposed to present him to a courtier, not a word left my tongue. I had to let someone else present him...
EVTOPTA65107: Of course I did it deliberately!
EVTOPTB65107: I'm sorry, my stutter sometimes act up...
EVTOPTC65107: What? I cannot do everything, can I?
EVTDESC65110: tHe otHeR cHildReN aRe MeaN to Me!
EVTDESC38302: It must be a miracle, I no longer have problem pronouncing S or any other letter! I have lost the Lisp trait.
INTERACTION_REQUIRES_ACTOR_RANSOM: [Actor.GetBestName] can afford the ransom of §Y$GOLD$§W gold
SEND_GIFT_INTERACTION_2: Send a gift of §Y$COST$§W¤ to §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§!. §RThis will not increase [Recipient.GetPossPronoun] opinion of you further.§!
DYNATREE_NOHEAD_DYNA: This Dynasty does not have any living members, it does not have a head
EVTOPTB5024: I'm having fun with it for now
ALREADY_CONTRACTED: They already have a contract with §Y$OWNER$§W.
CANNOT_AFFORD_TITLE_COST: You cannot afford the Cost of §R$GOLD$§!¤.
MENU_BAR_RESIGN_DEL: Resign and return to the Main Menu
MAPMODE_EMPIRES_DESC: This map mode shows all the geographical and traditional ('de jure') empires of Europe.
MAPMODE_ECONOMY_DESC: This map mode shows the income levels of the counties.
MAPMODE_REVOLT_RISK_DESC: This map mode shows the risk of a peasant uprising.
MAPMODE_DYNASTY_DESC: This map mode shows the ruling dynasties of Europe.
MAPMODE_OPINIONS_DESC: This map mode shows the opinions of other rulers toward the selected character.
EVTDESC3406: The church had just gotten some very beautiful stained glass windows and as I and [From.GetTitledFirstName] contemplated the windows the priest approached us and asked what we thought about them. I had thought about the symbolism of the windows while [From.GetTitledFirstName] just repeated what I had said.
EVTDESC72015: The guests have finally arrived! All is ready, the cooks have worked day and night preparing the food, and the castle has never looked lovelier.
EVTDESC74045: The local nobles of [Root.Location.GetName] complain about too many peasants entering the city during the Summer Fair.
EVTOPTA74045: Tell them to accept the peasants
EVTDESC72057: Guards seized me and made me spill even more wine onto my now completely ruined garb. Without a word and deaf to my protests, they carried me to the dungeon of [From.GetTitledFirstName] and left me there.
EVTOPTA72057: Am I here because of a dead servant?!
EVTDESC3481: The cook and I did not really plan to humiliate [From.GetTitledFirstName], we only wanted [From.GetHerHim] to realize how [From.GetHerHis] paranoia made everybody's life more difficult than it should be.
EVTOPTA75025: How can I ever reward you?
EVTTOOLTIP4112: [This.GetTitledFirstName] realizes that [This.GetSheHe] is not invited to [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s banquette
YOUKICKED: You have been kicked by the host.
EVTDESC4114: I rushed around trying to get everyone to work harder, not smarter to get everything ready for the banquette when the guests started to arrive. I waited impatiently for [From.GetTitledFirstName] but still did my best to make sure every guest felt welcome and found its designated place at my table.
EVTOPCF4114: [From.GetSheHeCap] told me how glad my invitation had made [From.GetHerHim]
EVTTOOLTIP8100: Receives a letter with my reply
EVTDESC20101:
My liege, my mission to [FromFrom.Location.GetName] has so far been a success! During my visit to the court of [From.GetBestName], I seem to have managed to make [From.GetHerHim] understand what a benevolent and peaceful ruler you really are and [From.GetSheHe] sends [From.GetHerHis] regards.

Your humble [Root.GetChancellorName],
[Root.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstName]
EVTDESC1910: I wonder if [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] does exist. Maybe [Root.Guardian.GetFullName] knows?
AIREASON_TOO_LOW_RANK_TO_ASK: Too low rank to request this
INTERACTION_REQUIRES_CHILD_WITH_NO_GUARD: Either party must have a child of suitable age at court
EVTDESC220: I gladly accept the Guardianship contract between [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and [New.GetTitledFirstName].
EVTDESC221: I fear that I cannot accept accept the Guardianship contract between [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and [New.GetTitledFirstName].
EVTDESC8701: To the Great [Root.GetTitledFirstName],\nYour wisdom and mercy are legendary. The Teutonic Order wishes to assist you in your valiant struggle against the pagans. By transfering a border County to the order, we will be able to establish a local presence and fight these heathens.
EVTOPTB8501: An intriguing idea, but not at this time...
EDUCATE_CHARACTER_INTERACTION_LONG_DESC: At age 6, children can be assigned a guardian for a proper upbringing. The choice is important, because the mentor will tend to pass on their skills, traits, religion, culture and type of education to the child.
EDUCATE_CHARACTER_INTERACTION_0: Select a child to be tutored.
EDUCATE_CHARACTER_INTERACTION_1: Select a guardian from the court of §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W.
EDUCATE_CHARACTER_INTERACTION_1B: Select a guardian from our court.
EDUCATE_CHARACTER_INTERACTION_2: Propose that §Y[AdultExtra.GetTitledFirstName]§W should become the guardian of §Y[ChildExtra.GetTitledFirstName]§W.
EDUCATE_CHARACTER_INTERACTION_3: Select a child from our court.
EDUCATE_CHARACTER_INTERACTION_3B: Select a child from the court of §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W.
EDUCATE_CHARACTER_INTERACTION_DECLINE_LO: §Y[AdultExtra.GetBestName]§W declined our proposal to be the new guardian for §Y[ChildExtra.GetBestName]§W.
EDUCATE_CHARACTER_INTERACTION_LETTER: We propose that [AdultExtra.GetBestName] become the guardian and mentor of little [ChildExtra.GetBestName], so [ChildExtra.GetSubjectPronoun] can be raised as a proper [AdultExtra.Culture.GetName] [AdultExtra.Religion.GetName].
EVTDESC30031: My prisoner [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s spouse  [From.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] sent me a letter insisting I would meet [From.Spouse.GetHerHim] in [From.Spouse.GetHerHis] keep. [From.Spouse.GetSheHeCap] asked me to show mercy and release [From.Spouse.GetHerHis] spouse for a hefty sum of money [From.Spouse.GetSheHe] obviously does not have.
EVTTOOLTIP30036: [This.GetTitledFirstName] will be warned about the consequences of freeing [This.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]
EVTDESC3230: I have taken such pride in myself lately that my [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName] noticed this and chided me about it.
EVTOPTE3655: My [Root.GetLordSpiritualName], [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName], is scared of the Wild Hunt!
EVTDESC30059: The [Root.Religion.GetName] church's men are not always easy to deal with. I need to make sure I have their approval and I have both my wife [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] and my [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] [Root.job_spiritual.GetFullName] giving me advice on how to earn the approval of the [Root.Religion.GetName] churches men.
EVTDESC30072: The friendship between me and a male courtier is very special, but I fear I might lose him if I cannot find a way to make my husband [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] get rid of the old [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] [Root.Spouse.job_spiritual.GetFullName] and appoint my friend as [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] in his stead.
EVTDESC30073: I have noticed [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]'s affection for one of the courtiers and heard her praise his [Player.Religion.GetPietyName], so it did not surprise me when she approached me and tried to convince me to appoint him as [Root.GetLordSpiritualName]. Trouble is, [Root.job_spiritual.GetFullName] is well respected and many would disapprove if I were to fulfill [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]'s wish.
EVTDESC30074: I know [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] [Root.Spouse.job_spiritual.GetFullName] is well respected, many would disapprove and reproach my husband [Root.Spouse.GetFullName] if he chooses to appoint my friend as the [Root.GetLordSpiritualName], but I don't care. I need a friend at court!
EVTTOOLTIP69089: All courtiers will know that [Root.GetTitledFirstName] does not trust [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] [This.GetTitledFirstName]
EVTDESC69089: [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s distrust in me as [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetLordSpiritualName] has made everyone in court dislike me!
EVTDESC75004: There is no man better at increasing the Church's opinion of me or teach me to become a more pious [Root.GetManWoman] than my [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName]!
EVTDESC75052: [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] [From.GetTitledFirstName] found a heretic at my court and insisted, nay, demanded that I would banish the heretic and make sure the heretic would never return on pain of death.
EVTDESC75054: What good is my position as [From.GetLordSpiritualName] if my liege won't listen to me? The heretic did not burn on the stake despite my desperate demands to [From.GetTitledFirstName].
EVTDESC20000: My liege, I am pleased to report the success of my mission to [From.Location.GetName]. The majority of the population have been converted to the [From.Religion.GetName] faith!\nYour humble [Root.GetLordSpiritualName]\n[From.GetTitledName]
EVTDESC20011:
My liege, I am pleased to report that your errant subject, [From.GetTitledName], has converted to the [From.Religion.GetName] faith. Praise [From.Religion.GetRandomGodName]!

Your humble [Root.GetLordSpiritualName],
[Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledName]
EVTDESC20012:
My liege, after being convinced by the [From.GetLordSpiritualName] from another province, I have decided to convert to the [From.Religion.GetName] faith!

Your humble servant,
[From.GetTitledName]
EVTDESC20022:
My liege, heathens attacked me when I tried to spread the Holy Faith in [From.Location.GetName]! I barely escaped with my life and am now severely wounded.

Your humble [Root.GetLordSpiritualName],
[From.GetTitledName]
EVTDESC20023: [Root.GetTitledName], your [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] [From.GetTitledName] was killed by heathens when trying to spread the Holy Faith in [From.Location.GetName].
EVTTOOLTIP20032: Send a letter to [From.Host.GetTitledName] explaining [From.Host.GetHerHis] [From.GetLordSpiritualName]'s mistake
EVTTOOLTIP20034: A chastising letter is sent to the [Root.GetLordSpiritualName]
EVTTOOLTIP20036: A complimentary letter is sent to the [Root.GetLordSpiritualName]
EVTDESC20033: My [Root.GetTitle], I ask for your forgiveness as a pious [From.Religion.GetName]! My [Root.GetLordSpiritualName]'s precipitous conclusion will no longer cause you any more grievance as I personally will make sure your [Player.Religion.GetPietyName] will be known as a fact and not a question.\nYour humble [From.GetTitle],\n[From.GetTitledName]
EVTDESC20036:
My [Root.GetLordSpiritualName], the evidence you presented against the noble is convincing and robust enough, there is no doubt in my mind that you have found a real heretic. A work well done!

Your humble [From.GetTitle],
[From.GetTitledName]
EVTDESC20038: News of unrest in [From.Location.GetName]! The [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] of [From.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetName] have been trying to root out heresy and convert the population, but the peasants have been resisting and are now arming themselves.
EVTDESC20039:
My liege, I write to you with bad news from [From.Location.GetName]. My efforts to root out heresy and convert the population have met with resistance, and the peasants are arming themselves. I fear we might have a revolt on our hands here soon.

Your humble [Root.GetLordSpiritualName],
[From.GetTitledName]
EVTDESC20071:
My liege, I have good news from my mission to [From.Location.GetName]! During my visit to the court of [From.GetBestName], I have filled [From.GetHerHis] ears with poisonous slander and evil rumors about [From.GetHerHis] spiritual leader. Their relation has been thoroughly sabotaged and I foresee that it is going to be anything but good from now on.

Your humble [Root.GetLordSpiritualName],
[Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledName]
EVTDESC20260:
My liege, during my stay in [From.Location.GetName] I have found a great philosopher who has agreed to help me with my studies to enhance culture in the province. With your permission I would suggest that we employ him.

Your humble [Root.GetLordSpiritualName],
[From.GetTitledName]
EVTDESC73230: It is sad that [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] is employing [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName] as [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] [Root.GetLordSpiritualName]. I am more competent and would be a better [Root.GetLordSpiritualName]!
EVTDESC73231: [From.GetBestName] claims that [From.GetSheHe] would be a better [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] than [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName], and petitions that [From.GetSheHe] should be given the title of [Root.GetLordSpiritualName] of the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName].
EVTDESC73232: My liege [From.GetBestName] is not entirely happy with our performance as [From.GetLordSpiritualName] of the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName], and is considering our replacement..
EVTDESC73233: Enough time has passed, I deserve to become [Root.Liege.GetLordSpiritualName] of the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName], and [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] will make me it!
EVTDESC73235:
My dear and trustworthy [This.GetBestName].
I hereby grant you the title as [From.GetLordSpiritualName] of the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName].

[From.GetBestName]
EVTDESC20270:
My [Root.GetTitle], the more I study the [From.Religion.GetName] religion the more I feel compelled to embrace it and to show you the wisdom that lies in these texts. I have sent you excerpts from the most interesting parts... ...I urge you to follow my example and embrace the [From.Religion.GetName] religion.

Your [Root.GetLordSpiritualName],
[From.GetTitledFirstName]
EVTDESC20061:
My liege, my mission to [FromFrom.Location.GetName] has so far been a success! During my visit to the court of [From.GetBestName], I seem to have managed to make [From.GetHerHim] understand what a benevolent and pious ruler you really are and [From.GetSheHe] sends [From.GetHerHis] regards.

Your humble [Root.GetLordSpiritualName],
[Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledName]
EVTDESC38060: My liege, [Root.Liege.GetTitledName], is in deep financial trouble. As my coffers are filled, this seems like a golden opportunity to acquire more land.
EVTDESC38061: [From.GetTitledName] has recognized the dire financial situation I am in. [From.GetSheHeCap] has sent me an offer to buy some land of mine.
EVTOPTC3012: The land belongs to the crown.
buy_indulgence_for_sins_desc: Send a letter to the Pope in the hope of getting our sins forgiven and increasing our piety.
EVTDESC8026:
For too long, the crown has restricted our historic rights and liberties. The time has come to [From.GetPlot]! With your regent, [Root.Regent.GetTitledName], among my supporters you have no other choice than to accept.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
EVTDESC75030: My slothfulness gets me into trouble with my liege [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] who claims I do not do a good enough job as a [Root.Liege.GetChancellorName] as I 'go to extreme lengths to avoid having to do any actual work'. [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]'s words, not mine.
EVTDESC75031: I grow more and more impatient with [Root.GetChancellorName] [From.GetTitledFirstName], [From.GetHerHis] slothfulness makes [From.GetHerHim] go to extreme lengths to avoid having to do any actual work.
EVTOPTB75031: I will give [From.GetHerHim] one last chance to sharpen up!
EVTDESC71001: The Hedge Knights have participated in a minor tournament together with in our knights in [Root.Location.GetName]. Sadly, one of those landless vagabonds have been severely injured.
EVTDESC20421:
My liege, I have bad news from [FromFrom.Location.GetName]. My attempts to increase the province levy has met with nothing but failure and the reason behind this is [From.GetTitledName]! [From.GetSheHeCap] has been nothing but trouble since I arrived and has used [From.GetHerHis] wide influence in [FromFrom.Location.GetName] to hinder all my initiatives.

Your humble [Root.GetMarshalName],
[Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName]
